lines.text: Gee, Brain. What are we going to do tonight?
The same thing we do every night, Pinky. Try to take over the world.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Woof, oh, I'd have to say the odds of that are terribly slim, Brain.
True.
I mean, really, when have I ever been pondering what you've been pondering?
To my knowledge, never.
Exactly. So, what are the chances that this time, I'm pondering what you're pondering?
Next to nil.
Well, that's exactly what I'm thinking, too.
Therefore, you ARE pondering what I'm pondering.
Poit, I guess I am.
I'd like to thank all the little people I stepped on to get where I am today.
I'm your biggest fan, what do ya say to that?
I'd say puberty was inordinately kind to you.
This is the earth. And this is Pinky. You can tell the difference quite easily. One is a lump of inert matter hurtling blindly through the void. The other... is the earth.
Narf!
Hurry up, Pinky, If we don't get to Carley Simon's house I'll never know if that song was about me.
We're going to a place where the sun never sets, the size of your wallet matters, and actors and actresses slave all day.
We're going to Denny's?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but if you replace the P with an O, my name would be Oinky, wouldn't it?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain... but do I really need 2 tongues?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but Zero Mostel times anything will still give you Zero Mostel.
Egad. You astound me, Brain.
That's a simple task, Pinky.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering, Pinky?
Wha, I think so Brain, but - *snort* No, no, it's too stupid.
We will disguise ourselves as a cow.
Narf. That was it *exactly*.
Quiet Pinky, I'm getting ready for tomorrow night.
Why? What are we going to do tomorrow night?

[Irritated]
Guess!
Oh, try to take over the world, right.
Pinky, are you pondering what... you know.
I think so, but... uh... something about a duck.
[theme song]
/ To prove their mousy worth, they'll overthrow the earth / They're dinky, they're Pinky and the Brain brain brain brain, brain brain brain brain... Narf!
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but this time, you put the trousers on the chimp.
[repeated line]
YES!
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Well, I think so Brain, but balancing a family, and a career? Ooh, it's all too much for me.
Moo. We are a cow. Take us to China.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but if we get "Sam spayed," we'll never have any puppies.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Wuh, I think so, Brain, but wouldn't anything lose its flavor on the bedpost overnight?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but if the plural of mouse is mice, wouldn't the plural of spouse be spice?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Yes Brain, but if our knees bent the other way, how would we ride a bicycle?
So many levels...
[drools]
ahhhhh...
Just say "poit".
Whenever I say "poit" Pinky, we will be on Mars.
What planet is this?
[the Brain's shrinking chant]
Charlie Sheen, Ben Vereen, shrink to the size of a lima bean.
And they say them UFO things are just pie plates... well, they ARE pie plates. ALIEN pie plates...
Tomorrow night, Pinky, we will come up with a new plan. One that isn't foiled by the atomic weight of gold.
Hi, I'm Bubba Beau Bob Brain.
Are there any questions?
Oh, Oh, pick me, Brain.
GENERAL Brain.
Yes, um, what is the password?
I can't tell you. If you were to be captured you might give it away.
What, me? Never, no, Narf, never.
And if you were tortured?
Oh, well that's different then, isn't it?
[the Brain has made a list of the 5 things needed to be a country singer]
Read the list to me, Pinky.
Okay. "Cowboy clothes."
Check.
Southern accent.
Check, Y'all.
Very good, Brain. "Working-class values."
I like beef jerky and the comedy stylings of Gallagher. Check.
A name consisting of no less than three words.
Just call me Bubba Bo Bob Brain. Check.
A height of at least six feet.
Che... Drats.
We must head to a place where overweight, middle-aged people go to party and throw away money.
Capitol Hill?
I will accept nothing less than mahogany.
There is no substitute for Diana Ross.
The entire world will beg to bow before me, their charismatic despot.
Enough. If this is what passes for conduct becoming of world leaders, I don't want any part of it.
Sigmund Freud would have had a field day with you, Pinky.
Ah, he liked sports then, did he?
Do you practice being dim or is it a natural talent?
Oh practice Brain. All day, EVERYDAY!
Pinky, there are times when I feel I'm bearing my soul to a tube of caulk.
Mmm! Caulk!
...And yet I continue.
Pinky, you give a whole new meaning to the phrase, "counter-intelligence." You have the I.Q. of plaster.
...that excites the masses.
Newspapers? Religious tracts? The Victoria's Secret catalogue?
So, you sacked the cocky khaki Kicky Sack sock plucker?
The second cocky khaki Kicky Sack sock plucker I've sacked since the sixth sitting sheet slitter got sick.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but if they called them "sad meals" no one would buy them.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but then it'd be Snow White and the Seven Samurai...
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but how are we going to make pencils that taste like bacon? Or maybe we should make bacon that tastes like pencils. Narf.
Yes, finally! The Happy Sappy Children of Many Lands ride! Where cheering music will spread the message that a mouse should rule the world!
Oh no, Brain. Narf! You're thinking of that other park in Orlando.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but burlap chafes me so.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, but where will we find an open tattoo parlor at this time of night?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but how will we get the Spice Girls into the paella?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but... Kevin Costner with an English accent? I dunno.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Well, I think so Brain, but isn't Regis Philbin already married?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Well, I think so Brain, but if we didn't have ears, we'd look like weasels.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but pants with horizontal stripes make me look chubby.
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but why would anyone want a depressed tounge?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Um... I think so, Brain, but what if the chicken won't wear the nylons?
Pinky, are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but if Jimmy cracked corn, and no one cares, why does he keep doing it?
What are we going to do tonight, Brain?
Same thing we do every night, Pinky. Try to ditch Dudley Boore!
[Pinky's film about World Domination is ruined]
Come, Pinky, we must prepare for tomorrow night.
Why? What are we going to do tomorrow night.
Same thing we do every night, Pinky. Try to take
[the film slows down and rips apart]
They're Dinky, They're Pinky and the Brain Brain Brain Brain Brain.
Behold, I can create fire from a little box.
So what?
Big deal.
Let's eat 'em.
I can steal your souls and put them in this glass.
So what?
Big deal.
Let's eat 'em.
I can make bubbles with my spit.
[the cannibals gasp and begin to bow]
*Now* do you believe we were sent by your god?
Naw, that's just *really cool*.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but we're already naked.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Uh, I think so, Brain, but balancing a family and a career... oooh, it's all too much for me.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but me and Pippi Longstocking... I mean, what would the children look like?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Uh... yeah, Brain, but where will we get rubber pants our size?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Well, I think so, Brain, but if Jimmy cracks corn, and no one cares, why does he keep doing it?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
Well, I think so, Brain, but I can't memorize a whole opera in Yiddish.
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so Brain, but the Rockettes, it's mostly girls, isn't it?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but how will we get a pair of Abe Vigoda's pants?
Are you pondering what I'm pondering?
I think so, Brain, but can the Gummi Worms really live in peace with the Marshmallow Chicks?
No, Pinky. Never use two drops of the formula. It would cause a reaction on the molecular level that is completely unpredictable.
Oh, I hate it when that happens. Narf.
Now throw the switch and let us begin the battle for the planet.
